class clusters.algs.Ligand(id, score, on_bits)¶

Bases: object

Parameters

  • id (int) – Identification number. Saved as class attribute.

  • score (float) – AutoDock Vina score. Saved as class attribute.

  • on_bits (np.array) – The “On” bits in the Extended Connectivity Fingerprint. Saved as class attribute.

clusters.algs.load_ligands(ligand_file)¶
Parameters

ligand_file (str) – Name of file containing information for each ligand.

Returns

ligands – List of Ligand objects.

Return type

list
